previews.title: Raspberry Pi 4B Setup
previews.content: Buy a Raspberry Pi 4B  You can buy the Raspberry Pi 4B board on Amazon, the recommended version is 4 GB. You may also need to buy a SD card, and...

previews.title: Minimalist Linux Workspace
previews.content: Download Image  Download Debian image, let we choose the net-install ISO since we don't need any heavy desktop enviroment e.g. KDE, GNOME, etc... . ...
